tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: American Pie 2 (1/11) Movie CLIP - Jim's Big Surprise (2001) HD
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis:
American Pie 2 Movie Clip - watch all clips http://j.mp/AoFRwR click to subscribe http://j.mp/sNDUs5
Jim's dad (Eugene Levy) tries to surprise Jim (Jason Biggs) with some beer at his dorm, but accidentally walks in on him having sex.
TM & © Universal (2012) Cast: Lee Garlington Director: J.B. Rogers MOVIECLIPS YouTube Channel: http://j.mp/vqieFG Join our Facebook page: http://j.mp/tb8OMH Follow us on Twitter: http://j.mp/rZzGsm Buy Movie: http://amzn.to/tIP7Rw Producer: Jane Bartelme, Chris Bender, Stefan Frank, Adam Herz, Chris Moore, Craig Perry, Chris Weitz, Paul Weitz, Warren Zide Screenwriter: Adam Herz, David H. Steinberg Film Description: The horny teen heroes of American Pie (1999) return for further raunchy antics in this comedy sequel written by the first film's creator, Adam Herz. Returning home following their freshman year of college, old friends Jim (Jason Biggs), Kevin (Thomas Ian Nicholas), Oz (Chris Klein), Finch (Eddie Kaye Thomas), and Stifler (Seann William Scott) rent a summer house on Lake Michigan where they hope to score romantically. However, complications ensue due to Jim's relative lack of experience, requiring an interlude with a fellow student and a visit to his old friend Michelle (Alyson Hanigan), who's now a band camp counselor, all in preparation for the return of Nadia (Shannon Elizabeth). In the meantime, Oz is separated from Heather (Mena Suvari) by a trip abroad, Finch has another encounter with Stifler's mom (Jennifer Coolidge), and Jim's dad (Eugene Levy) is as clueless as ever about his son's love life. Director J.B. Rogers served as first assistant director on the first film and made his directorial debut with Say It Isn't So (2001).
"american pie 2","american pie 2 clip","lee garlington","jb rogers","beer videos","blanket videos","pie videos",comedy,"late night comedies","chris bender","jane bartelme","chris moore","chris weitz","warren zide","craig perry","adam herz","paul weitz","stefan frank","embarrassment videos","sex sensuality videos","college videos","dorm videos","natalies mom","movie clips",movieclipsdotcom,#AMG:V+++249608,/m/02q1shb

hahaahahahaahaaaahaaaaaah﻿

Please give me a chance and hopefully you'll like it, If you do﻿ then please subscribe. If you don't, I'll thankful anyway!
